doc.title: Flash 14
doc.plot: Short news report with several interviews of famous people. Shows a benefit festival in the Teatro de la Zarzuela, with the assistance of the prince and the princess of Spain and the participation of: Luis Eduardo Aute, Conchita Velasco, Rocío Jurado, Rocío Dúrcal, Aurora Bautista, Pastora Imperio and Amalia Rodrigues, together with a theatrical play by David Copperfield.
